conversation.content: Hola, necesito hablar con alguien porque mi pago sigue fallando para un vuelo de Nueva York a Madrid.
Hi and welcome to Celestar Air. I’m Nova, your virtual flight assistant. Thanks for calling! How can I help you today?
Como dije, el pago falla. Prefiero hablar con una persona, por favor.
Noted. Would you like me to transfer you to a Celestar Air specialist now? I’ll just need a few quick details before I connect you.
Sí, por favor transfiera la llamada.
Great—before I connect you, may I have your full name as it appears on your booking or ID?
Thank you, Carlos Jiménez. Could you please provide your phone number?
Got it: +1 917-555-2486. Could you please provide your email address?
Thanks. I have c.jimenez83@gmail.com—is that correct and spelled as C dot Jimenez eight three at gmail dot com?

To make sure I route you properly, what’s the reason for the transfer—new booking, existing booking, payment issue, special assistance, policy question, or disruption? And if this is about an existing booking, do you have your reservation or PNR handy?
Es un problema de pago para una nueva reserva. No tengo PNR todavía.

Understood. I’ll connect you with a Celestar Air specialist. One moment please. Summary to agent: Caller name Carlos Jiménez, phone +1 917-555-2486, email c.jimenez83@gmail.com, no PNR provided, reason: payment issue while attempting a new booking NYC–Madrid.
